Hero.heading: I am Edson Araújo, Full Stack developer.
Hero.body1: I am a Full Stack developer with experience in various technologies, including Java, Spring, React, TypeScript, JavaScript, SQL, AWS, and unit testing with JUnit, Mockito, and Jest. I love writing code that provides amazing user experiences and makes people feel
Hero.body2: I am always eager to learn and explore new technologies, libraries, frameworks, programming languages, and new development approaches. Currently, I am learning about

InstagramInfo.description: Studying and sharing knowledge; Web Development; Coffee, daily life, and a few other things.

About.description1: I am a Web Developer in Santos, São Paulo - Brazil. My focus for years has been Full Stack development
About.description4: But currently I work on projects with
About.description6: I have spent most of my life deeply interested in technology and food, continuously building things with both. As a teenager, I was a typical computer nerd, spending most of my time messing with the computer, modding games and discovering things. Tinkering with hardware, assembling computers. Developing websites with Wordpress. And of course, playing games.
About.description7: Most of that is still true today.

birth.heading: Birth
birth.description: In Guarujá, São Paulo, I was born.

games.heading: Games
games.description: My siblings and I got a Nintendo Super NES, it started my life in games, and Super Mario is still my favorite.

school.heading: School
school.description: This year I started my academic life, my first year in public school.

newGames.heading: New games
newGames.description: This year I got an upgrade in games and received a Sega Mega Drive as a gift.

firstComputerContact.heading: First contact with Computer
firstComputerContact.description: My brother got a computer, and I had my first contact with it. Of course, it was love at first sight.

computerGames.heading: Games on computer
computerGames.description: After getting used to the computer, I started playing Habbo, a famous online game of the time, spending the whole afternoon playing.

socialMedia.heading: Starting with Social Media
socialMedia.description: I created my first account on Orkut and Twitter, I loved browsing social media.

firstFlight.heading: First flight
firstFlight.description: I traveled by plane for the first time, flying to Ceará to visit my family.

firstPhone.heading: My first phone
firstPhone.description: My mom gave me my first phone for my 11th birthday, and it wasn't even touch.

firstTouchPhone.heading: My first touch phone
firstTouchPhone.description: For my birthday, I got my first touch phone.

secondCearaTrip.heading: Second trip to Ceará
secondCearaTrip.description: I traveled for the second time to spend the year-end holidays in Ceará.

middleSchoolGraduation.heading: Graduated from Middle School
middleSchoolGraduation.description: I graduated from middle school, excited for the new stage of my life.

firstJob.heading: My first job
firstJob.description: My first job at the Guarujá City Hall as an apprentice.

englishStudies.heading: Studying English
englishStudies.description: I started my English course at a language school.

technicalCourse.heading: Technical course
technicalCourse.description: I started my technical course in Business Administration at ETEC in Guarujá.

endOfEnglishCourse.heading: End of English course
endOfEnglishCourse.description: I ended the English course due to financial issues, and continued studying alone.

highSchoolGraduation.heading: Graduated from High School
highSchoolGraduation.description: I graduated from high school in December 2019.

technicalCourseGraduation.heading: Graduated from technical course
technicalCourseGraduation.description: I completed my technical course in Business Administration.

businessAdministrationCollege.heading: Business Administration College
businessAdministrationCollege.description: I started studying Business Administration in college.

covid19.heading: Covid 19
covid19.description: Due to the Covid 19 quarantine, I started working from home, and my college was remote.

firstCode.heading: First line of code
firstCode.description: I wrote my first line of code in Python: print('Hello world')

computerEngineeringCollege.heading: Computer Engineering College
computerEngineeringCollege.description: I switched courses and universities to Computer Engineering and received a 100% scholarship.

frontEndCourseCompletion.heading: Completed Front End course
frontEndCourseCompletion.description: I completed my Front End course, and became very excited about development.

javaSpringCourse.heading: Back end with Java and Spring
javaSpringCourse.description: I completed my Back end course with Java and Spring, becoming a Full Stack developer.

firstDevJob.heading: Working as a Dev
firstDevJob.description: I was hired as a Full Stack Dev to work with Java, Struts, and React.

changedCourse.heading: Changed course
changedCourse.description: I changed my course due to conflicts with the curriculum of the previous university.

movedOut.heading: Moved out
movedOut.description: I moved out of my parents' house, scared of this challenge but it was always my goal.

typescriptCourseCompletion.heading: Completed TypeScript course
typescriptCourseCompletion.description: Due to its typing, I fell in love with TypeScript and completed this course.

seriousIllness.heading: Got very sick
seriousIllness.description: I discovered an autoimmune disease, it was a complicated period but I overcame it.

laravelProjects.heading: Participated in Laravel projects
laravelProjects.description: I worked on Laravel projects, had the challenge and opportunity to work with PHP and Laravel and Tailwind in an environmental management system.

tailwindProjects.heading: Exploring Tailwind
tailwindProjects.description: I completed my Tailwind course, I love developing projects with this library.

nextjsProjects.heading: Next.js projects
nextjsProjects.description: I developed projects with Next.js, which I enjoyed working with.

HelpDesk.name: HelpDesk
HelpDesk.description: This application is a complete ticketing system developed with Spring and Java to assist in the administration of tickets.

GameSecretNumber.name: Secret Number Game
GameSecretNumber.description: This is a game where you guess a number between 0 and 1000 and try to figure out the game's chosen number, receiving only hints if it is higher or lower.

BikeCraft.name: Bicycle Sales Website
BikeCraft.description: Website for a fictional Bicycle Sales company, very interesting addressing various UI/UX concepts.

RhSystem.name: HR System
RhSystem.description: System developed for the Human Resources department, with functionalities for employee registration, departments, and positions, all able to list the respective items.

SitePortfolio.name: Portfolio Website
SitePortfolio.description: Website developed to showcase my work and personal projects.

CrudJava.name: CRUD in Java
CrudJava.description: Test project developed with Java, Struts, JavaScript, and SQL and their relationships.

managementSystem.name: Management System
managementSystem.description: Project management system, fully hosted on AWS and developed with Spring, SQL, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, and React.

cv.name: Edson Araújo
cv.title: Full stack Developer
cv.intro: I am a Full Stack developer with experience in various technologies, including Java, Spring, React, TypeScript, JavaScript, SQL, AWS, and unit testing with JUnit, Mockito, and Jest. I often post content on my social media to democratize programming knowledge. It is also important for me to keep up with the development of web technology and UX design by listening to podcasts, attending local events, conferences, and using Twitter and Instagram.

education_1.institution: E. E. Prefeito Domingos de Souza

experience_1.company: Municipal Attorney General's Office of Guarujá
experience_1.title: Administrative Assistant - Legal
experience_1.responsibility_1: I worked on developing Excel spreadsheets for the administration of the sector's processes
experience_1.responsibility_2: I distributed and assigned processes to the available lawyers in the sector
experience_1.responsibility_3: I provided public service giving guidance about the judiciary in the region
experience_1.responsibility_4: I provided phone service giving guidance about the judiciary in the region

experience_2.title: Administrative Assistant - Dashboard
experience_2.responsibility_1: I mainly worked on creating Dashboards in Excel and developing VBA.
experience_2.responsibility_2: I held the position of Administrative Assistant supporting the environmental waste collection teams.
experience_2.responsibility_3: I created workflows with Excel VBA support for management teams.
experience_2.responsibility_4: Technical support for equipment and its management.

experience_3.title: Full stack Developer
experience_3.responsibility_1: I expanded my role with the implementation of React in the system, giving me the opportunity to work with this framework.
experience_3.responsibility_2: I became the Front-end representative of my team, sharing my knowledge and the innovations from my superiors in this area with the team.
experience_3.responsibility_3: After a few months, I got the opportunity to work as a Junior in the same position of Full stack Developer, expanding my role with AWS, web services, and API integration.
experience_3.responsibility_4: I started as a Trainee in the Full stack Developer role, working on developing new features and providing support in the company's system. The technologies I work with are Git, Java, JavaScript, Sass, jQuery, Struts, SQL, and Materialize. We also use Scrum for team management.

references_1.author: José Alberto dos Santos Silva
references_1.title: Coordinator
references_1.company: Municipal Attorney General's Office of Guarujá
references_1.reference: It is with great satisfaction that I write this letter to recommend the professional Edson Araújo, who performed his socio-learning offered by CAMP Guarujá in the Protocol sector of the Municipal Attorney General's Office from February 2018 to May 2019. In this regard, I highlight his excellent development in the sector, always contributing with empathy, flexibility, initiative, and punctuality. Additionally, among his obligations, I inform his performance in always meeting deadlines, aptitude, and agility. Therefore, I recommend the aforementioned professional for his role in the hiring sector and notify the notable contribution of his professional skills, which are undoubtedly relevant for the company's development.

references_2.author: Raphael de Almeida Tripodi
references_2.title: Municipal Attorney
references_2.company: Municipal Attorney General's Office of Guarujá
references_2.reference: Through this letter, I declare, for all due purposes, that Edson Araújo interned at this agency from 05/13/2019 to the present. During this time, he performed his activities in the administrative support unit to the municipal prosecutors acting in the judiciary area of this Municipality's attorney's office. In performing his activities, he was always very attentive, cordial, and agile in service, always revealing enthusiasm and ease in learning the internal procedures of our organization. During this time, he demonstrated to be an honest person with great growth potential.
